amendment.description: Substitute amendment to the Walker amendment (A012) sought to conform the authorization for fossil energy research and development, and energy conservation research and development to the levels in the Interior appropriations conference report and reduce 1997 DOE authorizations by 10 percent from 1996 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Walker amendment, to raise the funding authorization levels for fossil fuels and energy development to the levels of the Interior Appropriations conference report, with the exception that for FY 1997, funding levels would be reduced equivalent to the House passed version of the bill.

action.text: Substitute (A013) offered by Mr. Doyle to the Walker amendment (A012).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Doyle amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 706).
